Comment: Democrats should never use "woke" or "politically correct". Those are Republican slurs referring to the liberal ideals that Democrats have historically supported. Republicans have abandoned all the idealism and humanism at the center of Democratic liberalism. Now is the time for Democrats to embrace all the great things from FDR on and remind people that, contrary to Reagan and Trump, government is not the enemy.  Embrace liberal ideals and fight Trumpism, in all its cruelty, stupidity and overall vileness. Why can't most of them do that?
